data.name: killer7: 2018 Remastered Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
From rock to techno to jazz...treat your ears to the sounds of the indviduals in the killer7 and the world they inhabit with these 71 tracks. Remastered and overseen by Masafumi Takada.

1 Setting Sun Opening
2 A Fierce Good Fight
3 Hotel Battle
4 Blackburn
5 Where Angels Play
6 Shoot Speed
7 Celtic
8 Mystery House
9 Succesion
10 Election Plot

11 American Diplomacy
12 Russian Roulette
13 Geopolitics
14 Department of Defense
15 Back To The Light
16 Vote Falsification
17 3RD FOUNDATION
18 stoned
19 Love
20 When the May Rain Comes

data.short_description: 71 remastered tracks overseen by composer Masafumi Takada, including some that are available for the first time, that brilliantly portray every aspect of the killer7 lead by Harman Smith.
